oracle.pg.rdbms.pgql

Class PgqlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.rdbms.pgql.PgqlUtils

  • public class PgqlUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods for PGQL translation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PgqlUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      static java.lang.String escapeAndEnquoteLiteral(OraclePropertyGraph opg, java.lang.String str)
      Does a SQL escape of single quotes and enquotes the literal
      static java.lang.String unescapePgqlString(java.lang.String str)
      Unescapes constant Strings in a PGQL query for matching against stored versions of the same constant.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PgqlUtils

        public PgqlUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • escapeAndEnquoteLiteral

        public static java.lang.String escapeAndEnquoteLiteral(OraclePropertyGraph opg,
                                                       java.lang.String str)
                                                throws PgqlToSqlException
        Does a SQL escape of single quotes and enquotes the literal
        Parameters:
        opg - a property graph reference
        str - the string to escape
        Returns:
        enquoted str with single quotes escaped
        Throws:
        PgqlToSqlException

      • unescapePgqlString

        public static java.lang.String unescapePgqlString(java.lang.String str)
                                           throws PgqlToSqlException
        Unescapes constant Strings in a PGQL query for matching against stored versions of the same constant. \\, \n, \r and \t are unescaped.
        Parameters:
        str - the String to unescape
        Returns:
        a new String equal to str with all characters unescaped
        Throws:
        PgqlToSqlException
